EmailTemplate.subject: Save $10 For Your Business
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> FREE Shipping* <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/ EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
<[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/ EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
<[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/ EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Your $10 Is Here! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/%20EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Your points get you extraordinary rewards! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/%20EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Hope you got something special with your points! Don’t let it stop now, treat yourself with promo code GROCT10 to get $10 OFF your next purchase in October.
Take advantage on or before October 31st, 2018 at 24:00 EDT. Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Furniture <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/EN/search/pages/catalog/Furniture/_/N-acq?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Breakroom <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/ EN/search/pages/catalog/Breakroom/_/N-dv9?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Office Supplies <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/EN/search/pages/catalog/Office-Supplies/_/N-af2?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Technology <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/EN/search/pages/catalog/Technology/_/N-86f?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
<[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/EN/search/pages/catalog/Technology/_/N-86f?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Don’t forget to visit our Bonus Points Centre <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z00nlh?cmp=EBGRSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>every month to rack up your points! Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT18EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Offer valid from October 1st, 2018 – October 31st, 2018. Minimum purchase is not required. Enter promo code [GROCT10] at checkout. One time use only. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. Please allow up to 30 days for any bonus points to be added to your account. To check your current Grand Rewards points balance, please sign in to your account.
